info.title: Troi API
info.description:
This is the official API documentation of Troi.

# Authentication

Troi offers basic auth for authentication.

<security-definitions />

externalDocs.description: Find out more about the troi api

customer.description: Customer Name assigned by the client

host.description: Customer Host assigned by the client

parameters.name: extendedObject
parameters.description: extended object contains the full calculation position display path

parameters.name: fillsyncitems
parameters.description: Fetch all billings and fill the empty objects if there are any

get.summary: Fetch all calendar events at the given range
get.description: Fetch all calendar events at the given range

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start date (`YYYYMMDD`)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End date (`YYYYMMDD`)

parameters.name: search_key
parameters.description: Search in calendar events for string

parameters.name: owner_employee_id
parameters.description: Employee owner

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Calendar event type

`R`=regular, `H`=holiday, `G`=general, `P`=private, `T`=assigment

parameters.name: withoutAbsences
parameters.description: Return calendar event list without absences

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: ID of a system connected to Troi to simplify synchronization process

get.summary: Fetch all projects from given client
get.description: Fetch all projects from given client

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: Client ID

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and start with given project ID, use togehter with "size"

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and start with given project ID, use togehter with "from"

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and given date, only items modified since ETag will be returned

parameters.name: syncItem
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and set syncitems "true" to return ApiSyncItems

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and given customer ID

parameters.name: customerIsActive
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and given parameter, set to "true" to get only projects of active customers

parameters.name: projectIsInProcess
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and given parameter, set to "true" to get only "in process" projects

parameters.name: projectStatusId
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and given project status ID

parameters.name: projectTypeId
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and given project type ID

parameters.name: projectLeaderId
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and given leader ID

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and givenSearch Term

parameters.name: extendedObject
parameters.description: Fetch all projects for the given client ID and extend it with real objects instead of sync item

get.summary: Fetch all contacts
get.description: Fetch all contacts

parameters.name: syncItem
parameters.description: Fetch Contacts and return them as Sync Item

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Fetch Contacts from the given ID, use togehter with "from"

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Fetch Contacts for the given size use together with "size"

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Fetch Contacts for the given date time (only items modified since ETag will be returned)

parameters.name: favoritesOnly
parameters.description: Fetch favorites Contacts only

parameters.name: contactType
parameters.description: Fetch Contacts for the given Contact Type

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Fetch Contacts for the given Search Term

parameters.name: searchField
parameters.description:
Fetch Contacts for the given Search Field

single value:
searchField={"categoryId":392}

multiple values:
searchField={"categoryId":[392,396]}

available search options:
`categoryId` - string|array
`firstName` - string
`middleName` - string
`lastName` - string
`fullName` - string
`privateEmail` - string
`officeEmail` - string
`companyEmail` - string
`isDeleted` - bool

parameters.name: withCustomFields
parameters.description: Fetch Contacts for the given with Custom Field

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: Fetch Contacts for the given parent ID

parameters.name: isAssociatedWithCustomer
parameters.description: show all contacts that associated with some customer

parameters.name: onlyInactive
parameters.description: show all inactive contacts

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: <PUT SOME DESCRIPTION>

Source.description:
`S` = service source service
`M` = service source material
`P` = service source position

DisplayPath.example: Customer / TROI_19_0001 / Project 1 / Subproject 1 / Calculation Position 1

AcceptanceState.description:
`A` = calendar event acceptance state accepted
`D` = calendar event acceptance state declined
`U` = calendar event acceptance state unknown

ExternalDescription.example:
Expedita quia nobis dolorem voluptatibus est. Voluptatibus dolor ut aperiam iste et aut consectetur.
Voluptas quia qui doloremque dolore non sed. Aperiam distinctio omnis iure et qui nesciunt.

InternalDescription.example:
Expedita quia nobis dolorem voluptatibus est. Voluptatibus dolor ut aperiam iste et aut consectetur.
Voluptas quia qui doloremque dolore non sed. Aperiam distinctio omnis iure et qui nesciunt.

UnauthorizedError.description: Authentication information is missing or invalid

message.example: Bitte bergeben Sie die Anmeldedaten ber "HTTP Basic"
Der Pfad kann nicht verarbeitet werden: "example"

basicAuth.description:
The login via Basic Auth is done with the Troi user name and the API token, which can be generated in the Security Centre module.

See also:https://troi-software.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TG/pages/821918/Sicherheitscenter
